title: 一个单纯的疑问
author: eternal_永恒_
txt_content: 话说冥姐为什么要叫冥王星人，卤蛋为什么要叫卤蛋，爱国青年为什么要叫爱国青年，混乱为什么叫混乱，我为什么叫eternal_永恒_.

replies.author: eternal_永恒_
replies.txt_content:
九幽之帝 发表于 2016-10-30 15:44
因为所以 科学道理 永恒童鞋你懂了吗
miao没听懂

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
因为所以 科学道理 永恒童鞋你懂了吗





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: eternal_永恒_
replies.txt_content:
九幽之帝 发表于 2016-10-30 15:44

是不是还有蜘蛛蚂蚁，这是真理

replies.author: 金蛋之魂
replies.txt_content: 你为什叫 eternal_永恒_ 你应该问问你自己

。。。
我还想对楼上说因为狭义相对论呢
